title: priyamAi en manam
sahitya:
priyamAi en manam tiru naTam puriguvAi praNava kalA jyOtiyE Om shakti


anupallavi

  ari kadir pOla nI puri naghaiyAlE en angam kuLira sokkat-tanga aruvi pOlE


caraNam    paNNuru yAzh kuzhal taNNumaiyuDan aruL pazhutta nallisai vaLara
kiNkiNi salangaligaL kiLirndoLi tulangiDa kiraNangaL vIsiDum karaNangaL kulungiDa
